metadata.synopsis: If players will check out the main treasures (Hammer or Contract), after leaving the "treasure" zone Archivist will make a comment, depending on different states.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. teleport S_LOW_HouseOfHope_CheckMainTreasuresTrigger3. Make sure Archivist is not talking to Korrilla4. Leave the trigger (move to the exit)

0.speaker: Archivist
0.text: I see the Orphic Hammer has caught your eye. It really is a magnificent exhibit. Wholly unique.
0.context: NodeContext: Worried the player might steal

1.speaker: Archivist
1.text: Raphael has reserved this pedestal for the prize of his collection. It currently holds the contract of a rather unique soul.
1.context: NodeContext: Slight awe (but worried the player might steal)
